resources.string: This application is for research and educational purpose only.\n\n It is strongly recommended to confirm the 2FA request manually by yourself.
Autoentication needs to access your device\'s notification in order to work
Autoenticator is an app that helps you accept 2FA request on your phone automatically.\nIt works even if the screen is off.
It works by helping you to press the confirm button when the 2FA request notification pops up. Therefore it will need the access of your notifications.

This app will only access notifications of the mobile app "Duo Security", and it will only perform the confirm action without accessing its data. \nThis project is completely open-sourced and its source code is available\ton Github
